import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import ReactDOM from 'react-dom/client'; import './index.css'; import Navbar from './components/Navbar'; const App = () => { const [isTopBarVisible, setIsTopBarVisible] = useState(true); const [lastScrollY, setLastScrollY] = useState(0); const [currentSlide, setCurrentSlide] = useState(0); // Scroll-based navbar visibility useEffect(() => { const handleScroll = () => { const currentScrollY = window.scrollY; if (currentScrollY > lastScrollY && currentScrollY > 100) { // Scrolling down and past initial 100px setIsTopBarVisible(false); } else if (currentScrollY < lastScrollY && currentScrollY < 50) { // Scrolling up and almost at the top (within 50px) setIsTopBarVisible(true); } setLastScrollY(currentScrollY); }; window.addEventListener('scroll', handleScroll, { passive: true }); return () => { window.removeEventListener('scroll', handleScroll); }; }, [lastScrollY]); // Carousel navigation const handleSlideChange = (slideIndex) => { setCurrentSlide(slideIndex); }; return (

Explore Programs Apply Now
{/* Academic Programs Section */}

Academic Programs

Discover our comprehensive range of academic programs designed to prepare you for success

Bachelor of Science in Business Administration

Develop essential business skills and knowledge for leadership roles in various industries.

  • Financial Management
  • Marketing Management
  • Human Resource Management
  • Operations Management

Bachelor of Science in Information Technology

Master the latest technologies and prepare for careers in the digital world.

  • Software Development
  • Database Management
  • Network Administration
  • Web Development

Bachelor of Science in Education

Shape the future by becoming an educator and inspiring the next generation.

  • Elementary Education
  • Secondary Education
  • Special Education
  • Physical Education

Bachelor of Science in Hospitality Management

Excel in the dynamic world of hospitality and tourism management.

  • Hotel Operations
  • Food and Beverage
  • Tourism Management
  • Event Planning
Learn More About Academic Programs
{/* Admissions Section */}

Admissions

Start your journey towards academic excellence

Admission Requirements

  • Completed Application Form
  • High School Diploma or Equivalent
  • Official Transcript of Records
  • Certificate of Good Moral Character
  • Medical Certificate
  • 2x2 ID Pictures (4 copies)
  • Birth Certificate (NSO/PSA)

Application Process

1

Submit Application

Complete and submit your application form with all required documents

2

Entrance Examination

Take the college entrance examination on the scheduled date

3

Interview

Attend the scheduled interview with the admissions committee

4

Enrollment

Complete enrollment procedures and pay necessary fees

Learn More About Admissions
